Contact Support

We're here to help you!

  • Email: contact@quantumsofttechnologies.com
  • Phone: +91-7498857371
  • Live Chat: Available on our website during working hours (9 AM - 6 PM, Monday to Friday).

Note: For urgent issues, please contact us via phone or live chat for faster assistance.

Common Issues

We have solutions for common problems

  • Account Recovery: If you've forgotten your password or can't access your account, click the "Forgot Password" link on the login page to reset your password or recover your account.
  • Billing Support: Facing payment issues or want to request a refund? Please contact our billing team directly for assistance. We accept all major payment methods and offer quick refund processing for eligible cases.
  • Technical Assistance: Having trouble with our services? Browse through our FAQs for troubleshooting guides, or reach out to technical support for step-by-step assistance.
  • Bug Reporting: If you encounter a bug, report the issue through our "Help" section or contact support directly for prompt assistance.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Get instant answers to common questions

  • Q: What does Quantum Soft specialize in?
    A: Quantum Soft specializes in Website Development, Mobile App Development, and Cybersecurity.
  • Q: How do I create an account?
    A: Click "Sign Up" on our homepage, fill in the required details, and verify your email.
  • Q: Are the services customizable?
    A: Yes, we tailor our solutions to meet individual client needs.
  • Q: What industries do you serve?
    A: We primarily serve E-Commerce, Healthcare, and Education.
  • Q: What payment methods do you accept?
    A: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets.
  • Q: How can I request a refund?
    A: Contact our support team within 7 days of payment for refund inquiries.
